alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 9:39AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Suffolk and Nassau Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 938 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Oyster Bay to Hicksville to Baldwin. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Levittown, Freeport, Huntington Station, Lindenhurst, Glen Cove, Plainview, Garden City, Massapequa, Lynbrook, Syosset, Mineola, Huntington, Westbury, Farmingdale and Northport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
